mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_customer ( F_ID, F_NAME, F_PARENT_ID, F_TEL, F_ADDRESS, F_IDCARD, F_POINT, F_NICKNAME, F_TYPE, F_STATUS, F_CREATE_TIMESTAMP, F_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP ) VALUES ( #{customer.id}, #{customer.name}, #{customer.parentId}, #{customer.tel, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{customer.address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.idcard, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.point, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{customer.nickName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.type, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{customer.status, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, sysdate, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT t1.f_id, t1.f_name, t1.f_tel, t1.f_address, t1.f_idcard, t1.f_point, t1.f_nickname, t1.f_type, t1.f_status, t1.f_parent_id FROM t_customer t1 INNER JOIN (SELECT id, user_name FROM t_user WHERE status = '1' AND expiring_date >= sysdate START WITH id = #{userId} CONNECT BY PRIOR id = parent_id) t2 ON t1.f_parent_id = t2.id WHERE t1.f_id = #{id} AND t1.f_parent_id = #{userId}
SELECT t1.f_id, t1.f_name, t1.f_tel, t1.f_address, t1.f_idcard, t1.f_point, t1.f_nickname, t1.f_type, t1.f_status, t1.f_parent_id FROM t_customer t1 WHERE t1.f_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_customer SET f_name = #{customer.name}, f_tel = #{customer.tel}, f_address = #{customer.address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_idcard = #{customer.idcard, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_point = #{customer.point, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, f_type = #{customer.type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_status = #{customer.status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_update_timestamp = sysdate WHERE f_id = #{customer.id}
